content: sign up for my **mailing list** 1 to receive news and exclusive offers -join us for our **mini-makes crochet along** hosted by **clover usa** and **curiouspapaya** find all of the free cal details ** here 2 ** -this cal features 5 miniature crochet designs - each will be kept a secret until its release date however those who get the pdf bundle 3 will receive immediate access to all 5 patterns -each pattern will take ~30-60 min to complete and will be less than 2 in x 2 in in size if using the prescribed materials -the patterns in this bundle range from beginner-intermediate level due to being worked in a spiral row and in joined rnds -a full list of materials for each of the 5 designs will need is included in the pdf -follow me on instagram @curiouspapaya for the latest updates 1 https //view flodesk com/pages/63d4ba29de520bd60dc33f80 2 https //blog clover-usa com/2023/11/28/mini-makes-crochet-along/ 3 https //3dk9m2gdu02ph3ec-64115376359 shopifypreview com/products_preview preview_key=f1e23ce0b523d1e58811cfb322cab7b8
